vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.cashOut (patch_5.sol#21-28):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_5.sol#23-26)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_5.sol#24)
